title: zen brush font?
content:
anyone know what font this might be -- or a similar one? THANKS!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tao_font_5965.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tao\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/typophile.com/files/tao_font.jpg) | 9.93 KB |
author: adenson

comments.content:
Not a font, but calligraphy.

Similar (though not as elegant):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/sanvito/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/sanvito/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/sanvito/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/kasuga/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/kasuga/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/kasuga/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-gungseo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-gungseo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/s-core/core-gungseo/")  
 [http://www.psyops.com/shop/caterina/caterina-set/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/www.psyops.com/shop/caterina/caterina-set/ "http://www.psyops.com/shop/caterina/caterina-set/")

this is not too too far ... in case anyone else is looking:  
 [http://luc.devroye.org/KwakDooyul+NicolasNoh-NanumBrushScript-2010.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004643/http:/luc.devroye.org/KwakDooyul+NicolasNoh-NanumBrushScript-2010.png "http://luc.devroye.org/KwakDooyul+NicolasNoh-NanumBrushScript-2010.png")
